definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: That good for nothing never sends any money to his poor mother.
sentences.chinese: 那个没用的家伙，从不给他可怜的母亲送钱。

sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆说她母亲是这种服装的支持者。

sentences.english: Boy stole a lesson-book from one of his school-fellows and took it home to his Mother.
sentences.chinese: 有个男孩偷了同学的一本教科书，带回家给母亲。

sentences.english: The mother tiptoed into the room for fear that she should wake up her sleeping baby.
sentences.chinese: 母亲踮起脚尖走进房间，惟恐惊醒正在熟睡的宝宝。

sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡觉，也许你已见她加上的被子，那个是母亲。

sentences.english: I'm very pleased to meet you, the matron said, I'm his mother!
sentences.chinese: 很高兴认识你，护士长说，我是他的母亲。

sentences.english: The mother laid the sleeping boy against her.
sentences.chinese: 母亲让睡着的男孩紧靠着她。

sentences.english: Our parents didn't want us to marry, so we eloped .
sentences.chinese: 我们的父母亲不同意我们结婚，所以我们便私奔。

sentences.english: Tian’s mother asked him to go to a local university in their hometown of Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 田川的母亲想让他在家乡福建读大学。

sentences.english: My biological mother was a young unwed college graduate student and she decided to put me up for adoption.
sentences.chinese: 我的亲生母亲是一个年轻的没有结汇棠大学毕业生。

sentences.english: He keeps his head down as his mother blames him.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲谴责他时，他始终低着头。

sentences.english: My mother is one of the Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲是卫理公会派教徒之一。

sentences.english: I felt, well-being of mother love.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到，健康母亲的爱。

sentences.english: My mother was wrapping some banana fritters for a customer.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲当时正在为一位顾客包香蕉煎饼。

sentences.english: Our mother and the Yellow River, north of the city from its flowing.
sentences.chinese: 我们的母亲和黄河，也从它的城北流过。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
